Translations.Text: alli avaru yavude asabhya matannagali sullannagali kelalararu
idu satphalavagide, nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda. (Allade nimagagi) dharala udugoregalive
avanu akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu averadara naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu, avanu parama dayamayanu. Avanodane matanaduva adhikara yarigu illa
Ruh (jib‌ril) mattu itara malak‌galu salagi nilluva a dina, a parama dayamayana appane padedavaru hagu sariyadudannu heluvavara horatu yarigu matanadalu sadhyavagadu
a dinavu nijakku baralide. Ista ullavanu tanna odeyana bali asrayavannu padedu kollali

nanantu nim'mannu, sighrave baraliruva sikseya kuritu eccarisuttiruvenu. Andu pratiyobbanu tanna kaigalu munde kalisiruvudannu (karmavannu) kanuvanu mattu dhikkariyu, ‘‘ayyo, nanu mannagiddare cennagittu’’ ennuvanu
a maralikeyu tira nastada vyavaharavagide endu avaru heluttare
adara bennige avarella ondu bayalalli seruvaru
avara odeyanu avarannu pavitra ‘‘tuva’’ bettadinda karedu (helidanu)
